title: My guild was forcibly categorized by the admins an it does not show up in my mod log. I cannot change this categorization an my guild is shadowbanned from the new tab. I'll make anyone who asks a GM so you can see for yourself.

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:

body:
Mod me bro

Edit: Can confirm. Category is locked in as "identity politics" for +VidsOfBlacks and can not be changed. https://files.catbox.moe/fbwk1t.PNG  The posts don't show up in /new/, you can look for this recent post in /new/ to verify https://ruqqus.com/+VidsofBlacks/post/66ej/category-locking

body:
Thanks for the quick response.

Also, I have a weird request. I'm not going to stay as a mod of +VidsofBlacks, but I also kind of want a category-locked guild of my own. Can you lock the category of +GuildSquatting to Ruqqus Meta? Also, do guilds no longer become category locked if they're sieged?

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

Thanks for the quick response.

Also, I have a weird request. I'm not going to stay as a mod of +VidsofBlacks, but I also kind of want a category-locked guild of my own. Can you lock the category of +GuildSquatting to Ruqqus Meta? Also, do guilds no longer become category locked if they're sieged?

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
